mapper.select: select * from sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.sys_role_id = r.sys_role_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.sys_user_id = ur.sys_user_id AND username = #{username}

select p.* from sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON rp.sys_permission_id = p.sys_permission_id INNER JOIN sys_role r ON rp.sys_role_id = r.sys_role_id AND role_flag = #{roleFlag} group by p.sys_permission_id

SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.sys_permission_id = rp.sys_permission_id AND p.`type`='00' AND p.object_parent=0 INNER JOIN sys_role r ON r.sys_role_id = rp.sys_role_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.sys_role_id = r.sys_role_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.sys_user_id = ur.sys_user_id AND u.username = #{username} group by p.object_id
